MacroOp.Name: OMNI_NO_CONSTS
MacroOp.Considerations: If this is macro is defined, any constants will be undefined and you must use their macro equivlents instead.
MacroOp.Description: If this macro is enabled/defined, this will disable any constants defined in namespaces or classes. For example, instead of using the constant omni::math::PI in a funciton, you would have to utilize the OMNI_PI macro. This is in the rare event that the size of an executable should be taken into account; defining this compile time option will slightly reduce the overall size of the library code.
MacroOp.Notes: This does not disable any @c const values in local functions, it only disables the library constants.
MacroOp.Synopsis: Defining this macro will have the effect of having any library specific constants be undefined.
